record.field:
Hello there Administrator,

This is where you and your team can centralize your Knowledge and best practices! üöÄ


Diving in

This private page is for you to play around with.
Ready to give it a spin?

Try the following üëá

  • Check this box to indicate it's done
  • Click anywhere, and just start typing
  • Press Ctrl+Z/‚åò+Z to undo any change
  • Select text to Highlight, strikethrough or style it
  • Below this list, try commands by typing "/"
    • Add a checklist (/checklist)
    • Add a separator (/separator)
    • Use /heading to convert a text into a title


Got it? Now let's try advanced features üß†

  • Use /clipboard to insert a clipboard box. Need to re-use its content?
    • From any Odoo document, find this article by clicking on the üìó icon in the chatter.
    • You can use the clipboard as a description, a message or simply copy it to your clipboard! üëå
    • Not sure how to do it? Check the video below üëá
Open Video


Clipboard

Hello there, I am a template üëã
Use the buttons at the top-right of this box to re-use my content.
No more time wasted! üî•


  • Use /file to share documents that are frequently needed
    • Need this document somewhere? Come back here by clicking on the üìó icon in the chatter.
    • From this box, files can be previewed, forwarded and downloaded. üìÅ
Odoo Survival Guide
pdf


Want to go even faster? ‚ö°Ô∏è
Access Articles by opening the Command Palette (Ctrl+k/‚åò+k) then search through articles by starting your query with "?".


Navigation Basics üê£

üëà See the Menu there, on the left?

Those are your Articles.

Each of them can be used both as:

  • Content ‚Äî Just click and start typing (documentation, tips, reports, ...)
  • Folders ‚Äî Nest other Articles under it to regroup them (per team, topic, project, ...)

To change the way Articles are organized, you can simply Drag & Drop them


Who has access to what? üïµÔ∏è

Articles are stored into different Sections:

  • Favorites ‚Äî Those are shortcuts you create for yourself. Unstar ‚≠ê this page at the top to remove it from your favorites.
  • Workspace ‚Äî Articles there can be accessed by your team
  • Shared ‚Äî Those are the ones you have invited someone or been invited to
  • Private ‚Äî This is your stuff, the things you keep for yourself (Drafts, Todo lists, ...)

And again, to move an Article from a Section to another, just Drag & Drop it.

A good workflow is to write your drafts in Private and, once done, move it from Private to Workspace to share it with everyone.

And voil√†, it is that simple.

üöÄ


To be sure to stay updated, follow us on X, YouTube or Facebook.

Odoo for Beverages distributor

Welcome to your new Odoo Drink Distributors package! This guide will help you navigate the key features and get your distribution business running smoothly, with a focus on inventory management, efficient operations, and online sales.

BasicsInventory Management üì¶Deposit Management üçªSales Management üçæCustomer Relationship Management (CRM) ü§ùPurchase Management üõíPoint of Sale (POS) üí≥Barcode Scanning üì±eCommerce Website üåêDo You Want to Go Further?
‚ö†Ô∏è

If you want to easily discover every features of this package, try downloading the Demo Data.

You can still do it by upgrading your package in Apps. 

Just be careful, once demo data are uploaded, it cannot be easily deleted. But you can restart a fresh database on Odoo.com/trial


Basics

Inventory Management üì¶

The Inventory app is the core of your distribution business:

  • Track stock levels across multiple warehouses
  • Manage consignment for drinks sold in crates
  • Process incoming and outgoing shipments
  • Set up reordering rules for popular products

üéì Inventory


Deposit Management üçª

Manage your deposit more precisely and efficiently than ever before. 

  • Create deposit products for each different type of consigns
  • Apply DEP XX taxes to these consigns. 
  • Set a deposit product on your product to apply these taxes. This will ensure that you invoice correctly the price of consigns.

üí°

If you want to automatically split products sold in a specific packaging, precise a unit sale product in the so-called field and the number of units contained in the main product. 

This will automatically create a Bill of Material and process a Manufacture Order each time you need to split your product and reflect this operation in your stock perfectly. 

For example: 

  • Mobius Blanche - 24x33cl is your main product
  • Mobius Blanche - 33cl is the unit sale product
  • [FULL 33 BIN] Regular 24x33 Bin is the complete deposit product (4.5$ value)
  • [EMPTY 33 BIN] Regular 24x33 Bin is the empty deposit product (2.1$ value)

Every time you need to sell a single Mobius Blanche - 33cl, if you don't have enough in stock, it will split your main product in 24 units and take into account an extra empty bin that will be left at the end. 

The inventory of all products will be updated accordingly.

‚ö†Ô∏è

This deposit management system is a specific features of this package. Proceed carefully if you need to adapt anything.

  • Collect deposit when you deliver your customer. It is easy. When validating your delivery, you can directly set a "Return" and precisely count the number of each type of deposit your customer gave you. It will automatically be reflected on his invoice or issue a credit note.
  • You can also collect deposit directly on your Point of Sale. Select the correct product and encode a negative quantity.


Sales Management üçæ

Use the Sales app to:

  • Manage your product catalog
  • Create and track sales orders
  • Set up pricing strategies for different customer segments

üéì Sales


Customer Relationship Management (CRM) ü§ù

The CRM app helps you:

  • Track leads and opportunities
  • Manage your sales pipeline
  • Follow up with potential clients

üéì CRM


Purchase Management üõí

The Purchase app allows you to:

  • Create purchase orders
  • Manage supplier relationships
  • Track incoming shipments

üéì Purchase


Point of Sale (POS) üí≥

For B2C sales, the POS app enables you to:

  • Process quick sales at your distribution center
  • Handle returns and consignment easily
  • Keep your inventory updated in real-time

üéì Point of Sale


Barcode Scanning üì±

The Barcode app enhances your inventory operations:

  • Scan products for quick data entry
  • Perform efficient stock takes
  • Streamline picking and packing processes

üéì Barcode


eCommerce Website üåê

Your B2B eCommerce portal allows clients to:

  • Place orders online 24/7
  • View their order history and reorder easily
  • Access customer-specific pricing

üéì Website


‚úÖ

Tips for Success

  • Use barcode scanning for all inventory movements to ensure accuracy
  • Regularly update your website with new products and promotions
  • Train your team on efficient use of the barcode system in warehouse operations
  • Encourage your B2B clients to use the online ordering system for improved efficiency
  • Leverage the reporting tools across all apps to gain insights into your business performance


Do You Want to Go Further?

Odoo offers additional possibilities to enhance your drink distribution business:

  • Implement the Quality app to ensure consistent product quality
  • Utilize the Fleet app to manage your delivery vehicles efficiently
  • Use the Marketing Automation app to nurture leads and promote new products
  • Implement the Surveys app to gather customer feedback and improve your service

These features can be added to your current subscription. Feel free to explore and expand your Odoo experience!


üöÄ

Would you like to discuss your Odoo setup with us or explore more features?

Reach us

{'body': [{'patch': '-@124,125', 'create_uid': 2, 'create_date': '2024-09-20T16:56:05.457971', 'revision_id': 25, 'create_user_name': 'Jean Boonen (boje)'}, {'patch': '+@240:


üí°

Getting Started

  1. Set Up Your Inventory:
    • Navigate to Inventory > Configuration > Settings
    • Enable "Storage Locations" and "Multi-Step Routes"
    • Create warehouses and storage locations
  2. Configure Your Products:
    • Go to Inventory > Products
    • Add your beverages, specifying if they're sold in consignment crates
    • Set up reordering rules for each product
  3. Set Up Your Point of Sale:
    • Go to Point of Sale > Configuration > Point of Sale
    • Create a new POS and configure it for your needs
  4. Configure Barcode Scanning:
    • Go to Barcode > Configuration
    • Set up your barcode nomenclature and printing options
  5. Launch Your eCommerce Website:
    • Navigate to Website > Configuration > Settings
    • Enable eCommerce features and customize your site
  6. Add Suppliers and Import Customer Data:
    • Use the Purchase app to add suppliers
    • In the Contacts app, import your existing customer database
  7. Start Selling:
    • Begin creating sales orders in the Sales app
    • Use the POS for direct B2C sales
    • Encourage clients to use your new B2B ordering portal

Buying Process

  • What is their buyer's journey?

  • How do stakeholders interact regarding offers?
  • What is their key decision criteria?


Action Plan

What is your action plan to move forward with this account?

Centralize account insights in one document for comprehensive monitoring and follow-up.

Brand Assets

Please submit a request for assistance to the Marketing Team if you fall into one of the following:

  • Advertising that would appear online or on TV
  • SEO & SEA projects (betting on keywords, ...)
  • Booklets for a total price > $1000

For all other categories, we simply require you to follow the rules listed below.

Make sure to comply as you will represent our brand
If in doubt, get in touch with us.


Logo

Here are logos that you can use at your own convenience.
They can also be shared with customers, journalists and resellers.

Odoo Logo
JPG


Usage

  • Do not recreate the Logo from scratch, use these ones
  • Logos should only be used in the colors provided
  • Always include sufficient clear space around the logo


Brand Name Rules

YourCompany is very proud of its brand image.
When representing the brand, we thus ask you to be very cautious in how you refer to the company.

Do

  • Capitalize the word YourCompany, except if it's part of an URL e.g. website/company
  • Always type YourCompany in the same font size and style as the content of the text
  • Write it without any article(the YourCompany, a YourCompany, ...)

Do Not

  • Pluralize the trademark (e.g.YourCompanies)
  • Use the logo instead of the word inside sentences
  • Use the expression "YourCompanions" to refer to our community


"About Us" Template

Use this template whenever you have an announcement to make.


Clipboard

250 Executive Park Blvd, Suite 3400 94134
San Francisco California (US)
United States
info@yourcompany.com


YourCompany is proud to announce that...


About YourCompany: YourCompany is a team of passionate people whose goal is to improve everyone's life through disruptive products. We build great products to solve your business problems.
Our products are designed for small to medium size companies willing to optimize their performance.
Distribute brand digital assets while ensuring compliance with company policies and guidelines.

Company Newsletter : Month

Welcome to the last edition of the MyCompany Newsletter!
We are very excited to share with you the hottest updates and news! ü§©



Podcast updates üìª

The podcast launches its new technical talks, for all tech-savvy listeners out there! This new episode of the series features G√©ry, the mastermind behind OWL, the world fastest JS framework. üöÄ

A must listen for all developers out there and anyone interested in Javascript! üë®‚Äçüíª
Subscribe here to make sure you will not miss an episode!

PLANET ODOO




Events üåç


The Future Entrepreneurship Fair

This year again, Odoo was present at the Tech and Innovation festival for students in Antwerp, ready to promote our company!
Fabien was also there and gave an interview on the main stage.üì¢


Odoo Experience üéâ


Early bird alert üê¶

The tickets to participate to Odoo Experience 23 are now available and they are cheaper if you book them now!

Don't forget to spread the word, we're so looking forward to unveiling this new Odoo version! ü•≥

BOOK NOW



Egg'cellent runüê∞

More than 150 Odooers participated in this years' edition of the run of 5 or 11 kilometers.
Starting from the office, they enjoyed a great tour in the countryside before coming back to Grand-Rosi√®re, where they were welcomed with a drink and a burger.üçî

Thank you to everyone involved in the organization of this edition of the Odoo Run !

We already cannot wait for the next oneüèÉ



And that's all for this month, folks!
Thanks for reading, see you soon.üëã
Keep your colleagues informed about the company's latest developments and activities through periodic updates.

HR FAQ


Expense Policy

Who do I need to address if I need office supplies?

Instead of setting up complicated processes, we prefer to let our employees buy whatever they need. Just fill in an expense and we will reimburse you.


Why has my expense not been reimbursed? It has been accepted.

The Accounting team handles all payments on Fridays afternoon.
If 2 weeks have passed and you are still waiting to be paid, get in touch with them.


Car Policy

How do I know which model I can order or not?

Our catalog can be found here and is updated every 2 years. If you do not manage to find the specific model you are looking for, contact our FleetOfficer

Car_Catalog.png
png


Who can drive my car?

Your car can be driven by you, your spouse and by any person living under the same roof as long as they have a valid permit.


Leaves & Time Off

What do I have to do if I cannot work?

Please refer to the chart below.


An hour or two (medical appointment, ...) Let your Team Leader know in advance.
A day or less Inform HR and your Team Leader.
Absent for more than a day See a doctor and send us the sick note.
Answer questions frequently asked by your employees

Marketing Campaign Brief


‚åö Elevator Pitch

Describe your campaign in just a few words.


üöÄ Objective

What are you trying to accomplish with this campaign?


üéØ Target Audience

Who are you trying to reach?


üì£ Message

What are you trying to convince them of?


üìä KPIs

How will your measure progress?
Document your Marketing Campaigns to prioritize key objectives and outcomes.

 As a classic Gen Z member, Vittorio never watches TV and never listens to the radio. For him to see our message, we need to get to his Instagram feed.
Meeting Minutes
Centralize team meetings in a single article, while making sure notes are handled efficiently.

Meeting Minutes Template

‚òùüèº Please prepare the following before the meeting:

  • OpenERP becomes Odoo
  • Odoo Brand Assets

üó£ Meeting Agenda

üôåüèº Decisions Taken
  • Which color should we pick for the logo?
  • 5125C
  • Which text should we print on the billboards?
  • Odoo: Manage your SME online
  • Which size should the rollups be?
  • 85x200 or 100x200, depending on the content

Personal Organizer

Productivity is never an accident. It is always the result of a commitment to excellence, intelligent planning, and focused effort. ‚Äã - Paul J. Meyer

Things to handle this week*

  • Task A
  • Task B

Post-Mortem Analysis

Issue Summary

Explain what went wrong in just a few words.


Impact

Explain the consequences of this issue.


Causes

How did it get to happen?


Recovery

How was it solved?


Outcome

Lessons Learnt:

  1. Lesson A
  2. Lesson B
  3. Lesson C

Actions Taken:

  1. Action A
  2. Action B
  3. Action C
Analyze what went wrong and the underlying causes. Extract insights to avoid making similar mistakes in the future.

Tiny House Catalog


Available Models ‚úÖ


How to find the perfect model for your needs üòç

Here is a short guide that will help you pick the right tiny house for you.


1. How many people will live in this house?

While tiny houses are inherently small, it's important to prioritize comfort when sharing such limited space. To ensure everyone's happiness, we recommend allowing at least 9m¬≤ per person. If you plan to live with multiple roommates, our Serenit√† model is highly recommended, providing ample space for each individual to enjoy


2. What is your budget?

While tiny houses do offer a more cost-effective alternative to traditional houses, at MyCompany, we prioritize durability, which comes with a price. However, if you're on a tight budget, we have the perfect solution: our Cielo model.
It provides everything you need while allowing you to save.


3. Which style do you prefer: Natural or Industrial?

Whether your heart leans towards the rustic charm of a wooden hut or the intricate beauty of Victorian steelworks, we have you covered. Desiring a specific option? Rest assured, we are here to fulfill your wishes! Just get in touch with our architects and we will make sure to provide any specific choice you desire.

Natural Style ‚òò -

Industrial ‚öô-


4. What can I do if I haven't found exactly what I wanted?"

If none of those offers convinced you, just get in touch with our team.
At MyCompany, your happiness is our utmost priority, and we'll go the extra mile to make sure you find what you're looking for!

Contact Us



All Models üìñ

Sales Playbook

Compiled below are tips & tricks collected among our veterans to help newcomers get started. We hope it will help you sign deals.


Prospection Templates


PRO TIP: From a lead, use the book button in the chatter to find this article and autocomplete your email with this template.

Clipboard

Hey ProspectName,

I was doing some research online and found your company.
Considering we just launched ProductName, I was thinking you would be interested.

Could you please let me know on which number I could reach you so that we could get in touch?
It should not take longer than 15 minutes.

Talk to you soon,
YourName



PRO TIP: From a lead, use the book button in the chatter to find this article and autocomplete your description with this qualification template.

Clipboard

Prospect Qualification


  1. Company
    • Background:
    • Size:
    • Estimated Revenues:
    • Pain Points (tick the relevant ones)
      • Inconsistent customer experience
      • Complicated buying process
      • Costing too much money
  3. Contact
    • Job Position:
    • Email:
    • Phone:



The 5 Commandments

  1. My Forecast will always be accurate and up-to-date
  2. All my activities will always be encoded in our CRM
  3. I will only sell a project if I am convinced it can be a success
  4. I will not steal prospects from colleagues
  5. I will not waste time and energy bad-mouthing competitors


Tips to close more deals

  • Be assertive but listen to what is being said
  • Identify the pain points and offer clear solutions
  • Prepare your demos in advance and integrate the prospect's use case into it


Company Abbreviations

You may have heard those a million times and yet you are not entirely sure of what it means.
Here is a quick recap for you to shine during the next meeting.

MRR Monthly Recurring Revenues (subscriptions, ...)
NRR Non-Recurring Revenues (consultancy services, ...)
USP Unique Selling Proposition: Advantage that makes you stand out from the competition.
Q1,2,3,4 Nth Quarter of the fiscal year.
E.g. Q4 starts on Oct. 1 and ends on Dec. 31.
Provide salespeople with tips, lexicon and templates to help them sell faster.
